meaning_str.bing:
n. 供应量；供给量；储备；补给品
adv. 同“supplely”
v. （尤指大量）供应
网络. 提供；电源；供应品

供应量；供给量；储备；补给品

提供（所需物品）；供应；补充；填充；代理，暂代（空缺等）；弥补（缺陷、损失）；满足需求；满足需要
供应；供给；供给量；储备；贮备；存货；库存；补给品；供应的东西；物资；必需品；粮秣；日常用品；供应商；供应系统；<经>在一定价格下的商品供应量；临时替代者；代理牧师；代课教师；<英>拨给政府作开支的款项；所提供的生活费
与供应有关的；与补给有关的；代理的；暂代的

1.en: It promises utilities to supply them if they need additional power and is paid as if it were keeping physical plants ready.
1.cn: 这家公司保证向电力公司提供需要时的额外电力，费用按照随时保有实际电厂模式支付。

2.en: It is all our pleasure to serve for you, supply the comprehensive solution for you, to make you enamoured in the natural stone.
2.cn: 我们将竭诚为您服务，为您提供全面的石材方案解决之策，让您享受天然石材带来的无限乐趣！

3.en: "Receipts, receipts" they brazenly shout, trying to hawk fake paid invoices from hotels, restaurants or office supply companies.
3.cn: “发票，发票”，她们厚颜无耻地大声吆喝着，试图兜售宾馆、饭店或办公用品公司开具的假发票。

0.en: You'd get power and plumbing from the supply at King's Barrow.
0.cn: 金斯巴罗农场能为我们供应水电。

1.en: She's shut down three of our supply centers for human subjects in the last two months.
1.cn: 过去两个月里她已经破坏了我们三个人体试验品的供应中心

2.en: This tiny inlet of Hainan Island is the key to one of China's biggest supply problems: their love of seafood.
2.cn: 海南岛的这一小小港湾就有解决中国最棘手的供应难题之一——他们对海鲜的热爱——的关键。

3.en: Soon, they'll control the energy supply of half the world. In effect, they become a new superpower. The world needs Robert Fischer to change his mind.
3.cn: 很快非榭能源公司会控制半个世界的能源供应，最终非榭能源公司会成为大赢家。总言之要令费舍尔改变想法。

4.en: On the other hand, if the money supply remains the same, while more goods and services are produced, each dollar's value would increase in a process known as deflation.
4.cn: 另一方面，如果货币供应量不变，但商品和服务增加，每一分钱的价值就会增加，这过程就叫通货紧缩。

5.en: On the other hand, if the money supply remains the same, while more goods and services are produced, each dollar's value would increase in a process known as deflation.
5.cn: 另一方面，如果货币供应量不变，但商品和服务增加，每一分钱的价值就会增加，这过程就叫通货紧缩。

6.en: While companies like Honda, Toyota, BMW, and Nissan have opened new factories, spawning a vast network of American-owned auto-supply firms, all these dots you see here.
6.cn: 而像本田，丰田，宝马和日产却开了新的工厂，为美产汽车供应公司铺开了巨网，你在这里见到的这些点。

7.en: So you don't care about the owners, just about food supply.
7.cn: 那么，你们并不在乎庄园主们，只担心粮食生产。

8.en: It's safe with the Vision. These days safe is in short supply.
8.cn: 它在幻视手里是安全的，如今安全也是一种奢侈了。

9.en: And each one needs fuel so it can supply power 365 days a year.
9.cn: 每个电站都要消耗能量，所以才能1年365天不间断供电。

10.en: Supply lines here. While the Eastern Sea hems them in both south and east.
10.cn: 补给线在这里，同时在东部海岸的从南部和东部包围他们。

11.en: For example, I noticed that you purchase your tampons one-month supply at a time.
11.cn: 比如说我发现你的卫生巾一次是购买一个月的量。

12.en: When the price of something rises, people will supply more of it and buy less of it.
12.cn: 当某种东西的价格上升，人们自然会增加生产，然后买的人就会变少。

13.en: Uganda, 2012. Synthetic Cathinone. You put it in the water supply of a guerrilla army base.
13.cn: 2012年，乌干达。合成卡西酮 。被用于污染了陆军基地的供给水源。

14.en: Just to play devil's advocate, maybe he has the most basic understanding of supply and demand.
14.cn: 我忠言逆耳一下，或许他对基本的供需关系有所了解呢。

15.en: You supply a service. Yes. Traditionally, higher education is a product marketed only to the elite.
15.cn: 你是在提供服务。是的，传统意义上，高等教育是一项只为精英人群服务的产品。

16.en: He poisoned the water supply, bringing on the dark ages. Death and disease and suffering ran rampant.
16.cn: 他在水源下了毒，带来了黑暗时期，死亡，疾病，肆意猖獗。

17.en: Time being something of which we don't have an infinite supply, so if we could be about our business.
17.cn: 时间并不是取之不尽用之不竭的。麻烦让我们继续工作吧。

18.en: When Sheldon showers second, any and all measures shall be taken to ensure an adequate supply of hot water.
18.cn: "当谢尔顿第二个洗澡时必须采取各种方法保证有足够的热水"。

19.en: Ben. Did you know about the push-button phone working with the landline? The supply box? Tactical radio channels?
19.cn: 本，你知道按键式电话能和陆线连接起来用吗？电源箱？火灾指挥用频道？
